H0.text: What was the previous name of the city of Maputo. Lourenço Marques

H1.text: What was the previous name of the city of Maputo. Delagoa

H2.text: What was the previous name of the city of Maputo. Mozambique City

H3.text: What was the previous name of the city of Maputo. Maputo

A4.text: Maputo was formerly named Lourenço Marques (Portuguese: [lo(w)ˈɾẽsu ˈmaɾkɨʃ]; until 1976)

A5.text: However, after independence, the city's name was changed (in February 1976) to Maputo
